TopicTitle: UP1983WP's War Vehicles: Planes, Vehicles, and More

Articles.Content:
Hi everyone,

So, inspired by the "KSP Kollaborative Warfare" series on Youtube, I have made my own battle vehicles.

First off, the TE-92 Artillery Truck. This thing has two missiles. Each one is an RT-5 with a 1.25m probe core and a nose cone attached, as well as 4 guidance fins. Be warned: this thing is kinda top-heavy.

Next is a plane: the FF-20 Fighter. This thing also has two missiles. It's rocket powered (one LV-T45). Each missile is an OKTO2 with 3 Oscar-B fuel tanks, a Spark engine, and a small nose cone. Incredibly maneuverable; however, at supersonic speeds you need to use the A.I.R.B.R.A.K.E.S. before turning, otherwise your plane could tear apart.

Next up, another plane: the TB-53 Bomber. This one.... It's a failed design. In testing of the original model, two of the 3 pairs of control surfaces on the wings went the wrong way, thus preventing takeoff. And when I was able to just barely able to get it flying, it spiraled out of control. But when you download it yourself, maybe you can fix it...

Finally, we have the LM-99 Missile. It can make it 1/8 of the way around the planet. It's a two stage rocket. Enough said.

And one more shot of the FF-20 with the Scatterer mod, just for the sake of looking amazing:
